text: Félix Gouin (; 4 October 1884 - 25 October 1977) was a French Socialist politician who was a member of the French Section of the Workers' International (SFIO). ==Honours and awards== * Grand Croix of the Légion d'honneur * Grand Decoration of Honour in Silver with Sash for Services to the Republic of Austria ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Presidents of France Category:Presidents of the National Assembly (France) Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Bouches-du-Rhône Category:20th-century heads of state of France
title: Félix Gouin
